package.name: Mail_Mbox
package.summary: Mbox PHP class to Unix MBOX parsing and using.
package.description: It can split messages inside a Mbox, return the number of messages, return, update or remove an specific message or add a message on the Mbox.

release.notes: o improved _process() speed to read line per line instead of byte per byte. (Joern)

o fixed mbox::size() bug that have never return 0 (Roger Keays) o mbox::remove() now accept arrays on $message param as well (Roger Keays) o declarated all vars to skip php warnings on high warning levels (Roger Keays) o some minor spelling errors (Roger Keays) o fwrite must use '===' false instead of !fwrite (Roger Keays)
